idea-plugin.name: Daakia
idea-plugin.description: An IntelliJ plugin designed to streamline API development directly within the IntelliJ IDE. It offers a comprehensive set of features to manage and test the rest APIs seamlessly, all without leaving your development environment.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
v3.0.0 - Major UI & Panel Management Enhancements

  • Double-click divider to dynamically resize panels (maximize left, reset, maximize right)
  • Improved panel visibility toggling and divider thresholds
  • Refactored request/response panel handling: hide response content when collapsed, smooth state restoration
  • Enhanced trash panel: restore and permanent delete actions, ancestor/parent folder restoration
  • Improved collection management: new DbTreeStoreService, fixed empty folder save, improved import/export
  • UI refinements: built-in editor for user input, adaptive layouts, async request progress bar, removed unused buttons

v2.0.4

  • Persistent debug mode and script log settings via DaakiaSettings
  • About dialog now remembers Script/GraalVM checkbox state
  • Debug tab created on EDT, shows logs instantly
  • Tabs for History, Collection, and Environment always created on the Swing thread
  • Improved stability and UI responsiveness with ApplicationManager.invokeLater

v2.0.3

  • Scripts Tab: Added pre-request and post-request script editors (JavaScript)
  • Environment Variable Scripting: Support for modifying environment variables via daakia.setGlobalEnvVar
  • Authorization Enhancements: Auth headers resolve environment variable placeholders (e.g., {{token}})
  • GraalVM Migration: Replaced Nashorn with GraalVM for JavaScript execution
  • Postman Compatibility: Import/export includes auth headers and script events
  • Persistence: Script content saved with history and collection records

v2.0.2

  • Added SQLite persistence layer and DAO classes
  • Created Postman import/export utilities for collections
  • Implemented environment and variable data models with management UI
  • Enhanced plugin with GraphQL request support
  • Refined environment panel layout and text box alignment
  • Added dynamic row management for environment variables
  • Introduced placeholder-enabled PasswordInputField and updated authorization panel layout
  • Bug fixes and enhancements

v1.0.x

  • v1.0.8: Search text functionality in collection and history panel
  • v1.0.7: Multipart-form data support
  • v1.0.6: Minor bug fixes and UI polish
  • v1.0.5: Progress view on send, default request headers
  • v1.0.4: Context menu on tabs (Close other/all tabs), minor improvements
  • v1.0.3: Pool thread for API invocation, 503 error handling
  • v1.0.2: JSON linter and formatter for request/response bodies
  • v1.0.1: Bug fix for 401 on POST
  • v1.0.0: Initial release
